org.loboevolution.pdfview

Class Identity8BitCharsetEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder
      • org.loboevolution.pdfview.Identity8BitCharsetEncoder

  • public class Identity8BitCharsetEncoder
extends CharsetEncoder
    A CharsetEncoder that attempts to write out the lower 8 bits of any character. Characters >= 256 in value are regarded as unmappable. Author Luke Kirby
